roleset.name: apply thin liquid to surface

example.name: all args
example.text: The oil company claims that Alaskan officials prevented Exxon-1 from [*-1] spraying dispersant onto the almost 11 million gallons of oil dumped when one of its tankers ran into an underwater reef.
example.arg: onto the almost 11 million gallons of oil dumped when one of its tankers ran into an underwater reef

roleset.note: Frames file for 'spray' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.7, Framenet entries Filling and Placing.
